name: Herovania
description:
A 2.5D metroidvania platformer with jetpack and dynamites!

Story:

An underground mine nearly collapsed and 7 miners are trapped there. The mine is about to collapse completely in 30 minutes and nobody dares to go there. Being a superhero, you are going to help them. Do your best and make it count.

* Best played with Gamepad *

Gameplay Instructions
A+D for move right and left
W for activating jetpack
S for planting dynamite
Space for shooting laser

In-game instructions too!

Created with Unreal Engine 4 in 5 days for 2019 Summer #ue4jam

Follow us @ Twitter
